page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content:
West Horndon is fairly modern.All of the houses were built in the last 100 years.The oldest ones were made in the thirties.The next complex was built in the fifties.The new ones were built in the last 4 years.West Horndon is a private village Most people are well off.Most people in West Horndon live in Semi_Detached houses.There are many Bungalows.There are few Detached houses or Flats. When West Horndon was first built they used brick.But more recently they were brick and breeze block.On the new site they are timber frame and brick. Nearly all houses have all Mains Services.However a few houses use Calor gas.
{
